project.name: Orion Edge Gateway
project.scope: API gateway, rate limiting, auth integration

sections.title: Introduction & Context
sections.goal: Establish rapport and get high-level overview of the interviewee's role in Orion Edge Gateway project
sample_questions: Can you briefly describe your role and responsibilities in the Orion Edge Gateway build phase?
What are the primary reliability objectives for the gateway service?
Which runbooks or SLAs are most relevant to your daily work on this project?

sections.title: Incident Response & Runbook Usage
sections.goal: Understand how the interviewee applies runbooks like RB-GW-011 during incidents
sample_questions: Walk me through a recent deployment incident and how you applied RB-GW-011.
How do you verify that rolling deployments meet SLA-ORI-02 latency requirements?
What heuristics do you use when runbook guidance is incomplete?

sections.title: Cross-Subsystem Dependencies
sections.goal: Explore how Orion Edge Gateway interacts with IAM and Observability systems
sample_questions: Can you explain a scenario where a gateway auth integration issue required coordination with Aegis IAM?
How do you leverage Nimbus Observability traces to debug p95 latency breaches?
Describe a time when a change in IAM policy-as-code impacted gateway rate limiting.

sections.title: Reliability Engineering Practices
sections.goal: Discuss preventive measures, SLO tracking, and failure budget management
sample_questions: How do you monitor and adjust rate limiting to protect upstream services without violating SLAs?
What’s your process for calculating and consuming failure budgets for the gateway?
How do you balance deployment velocity with safety-first values?

sections.title: Decision Making & Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Understand critical choices made under constraints and their long-term impact
sample_questions: Describe a time you had to choose between a quick hotfix and a planned rollout—what evidence did you use?
How do you assess the blast radius of a gateway config change?
What risks do you see in the current blue/green deployment approach for Orion?

sections.title: Closing & Reflection
sections.goal: Summarize key points, capture lessons learned, and identify improvement areas
sample_questions: What would you change in the existing runbook RB-GW-011 based on recent incidents?
What’s your top recommendation for improving Orion Gateway reliability?
Any final thoughts on how cross-team collaboration has worked so far?
